sentences.sContent: ...The video challenge does not put individual students on the hot seat—so it’s less intimidating by design...
...The biggest and most exciting challenge of this technology is how to creatively leverage this ever-growing amount of data to deliver cost savings...
...What is the most exciting challenge when we possess more and more data...
...what is the most exciting challenge when we possess more and more data...
...Another challenge to language survival is television...
...part of its effort to challenge the dominance of the American GPS...
...there is reason to continue to use and develop them to help meet the enormous challenge of Sustainably feeding a growing planet...
...Economic inequality is the "defining challenge of our time...
...most developers would be too lazy to challenge them...
...This level of wastage is a tragedy that cannot continue if we are to succeed in the challenge of sustainably meeting our future food demands...
The role will be the biggest challenge of his acting career.
sentences.sCn: 扮演这个角色将是他演艺生涯中最大的挑战。

phrases.pCn: 接受挑战，奋起应付挑战

words.tran: 挑战的；引起挑战性兴趣的
要求；质疑；反对；向…挑战；盘问（challenge的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a new or difficult task that tests sb's ability and skill
